2782263070: Serivisi nicyo kintu cyambere kuri twe. Turakomeza 24/7 kumuhamagaro kandi dutanga guhuza Slack hamwe nitsinda ryanyu ryo guhuza ibikorwa hamwe nabakozi bacu bahamagaye mugihe na nyuma yo kubishyira mubikorwa.
2890048009: Imiyoboro yamamaza ibona abashyitsi bawe nkibicuruzwa. Kuri twe igicuruzwa cyonyine ni ukugena ubumuntu bwabo. Serivisi zacu zujuje cyangwa zirenze GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, na PIPL ibisabwa, kandi dushyigikire ibikorwa nka Pass Pass. Turakora cyane kugirango duhuze ubuzima bwite n'umutekano.

a11y-img-1: Kugera kubakoresha ecran nyuma yo kwinjira
a11y-img-2: Amahitamo yo kuboneka muri menu ya widget UI
a11y-img-3: Kugera kubiganiro agasanduku muri widget UI
about-advisors-brendan: Umuyobozi mukuru wa Brave. Umwe mu bashinze Mozilla. Uwashizeho ururimi rwa porogaramu ya JavaScript. Kubaka mushakisha nibindi byinshi.
about-advisors-dawn: Porofeseri, CS muri kaminuza ya Californiya, Berkeley. Kwiga byimbitse, umutekano, impuguke. Umuyobozi mukuru wa Oasis Labs.
about-advisors-keiran: Umuhanga mu bushakashatsi muri Stanford. Kwiga imashini hamwe nubukungu bwuzuye muri banki nkuru, amafaranga yo gukingira, na kaminuza.
about-content-text-1a: hCaptcha izana uburyo bugezweho, bwibanda ku guhagarika bots.
about-content-text-1b: Twerekana ibibazo bya CAPTCHA bigoye kuri bots ariko byoroshye kubantu mukusanya amakuru atoroshye-kurango kubibazo byo kwiga imashini, no kuyikoresha kugirango tumenye niba urubuga cyangwa umushyitsi wa porogaramu ari umuntu.
about-content-text-2a: Abakinnyi babi bakunze kugaragara kumurongo. Ariko kwigomwa ubuzima bwabakoresha ntabwo aricyo gisubizo.
about-content-text-2b: Ibisubizo byumutekano bitangwa namasosiyete yamamaza byibanda cyane cyane mugukurikirana abakoresha kurubuga. Twashizeho igisubizo cyiza cyumutekano kigaragaza kwangiza ubuzima bwabakoresha ntabwo ari ngombwa gutanga ibisubizo byiza.
about-intro-text: HCaptcha ni serivisi ikoreshwa cyane kwisi yigenga ya CAPTCHA.
about-leadership-headsub: Ikipe inararibonye, ikora kubibazo bikomeye byumunsi.
about-leadership-text1: Dufite ubuhanga bwo kwiga byimbitse no kwerekana imashini yerekana imashini yiga ku gipimo, hibandwa cyane cyane ku gushakisha sisitemu zo kuri interineti ziteye ubwoba bugezweho.
about-leadership-text2: Hamwe nimyaka myinshi ya software hamwe nubuhanga bwo kwiga imashini, twubaka kandi dukoresha sisitemu nini nini kugirango dukemure bimwe mubibazo bikomeye byumunsi mugihe tubungabunga ubuzima bwite.
acc-opt-text: Waba ufite ubumuga bwo kutabona cyangwa ubundi udashobora kurangiza hCaptchas?
appreciate-in: Twishimiye ibitekerezo byanyu. Tumenyeshe ibibazo byose kandi tuzabikemura vuba.
feedback-text: Tanga ibitekerezo kuri hCaptcha umaze kubona
footer-copyright-text: hCaptcha ni ikirango cyanditse cya Intuition Machines, Inc.
home-about-text-1: hCaptcha yashizweho kugirango ikemure ikibazo cyibikorwa byinshi byakazi mukwiga imashini: kuranga umubare munini wamakuru muburyo bwihuse, buhendutse, kandi bwizewe.
home-about-text-2: Amakuru menshi muri rusange atanga ibisubizo byiza muburyo bwo kwiga imashini yiga. Intsinzi iheruka yicyitegererezo cyimbitse yatumye habaho imibare nini cyane, hafi buri gihe hamwe nabantu bamwe basubiramo. Ariko, gukora imibare minini yasuzumwe nabantu ikoresheje Mechanical Turk, Igicapo Umunani, nibindi biratinda kandi bihenze.
home-about-text-3: hCaptcha yemerera imbuga za interineti kubona amafaranga atanga iki cyifuzo mugihe uhagarika bots nubundi buryo bwo guhohoterwa.
home-about-text-4: Isoko rya HCaptcha rikoreshwa na Protokole ya HUMAN, protocole ifunguye yegerejwe abaturage kugirango isuzume abantu ikorera kuri Ethereum. Imbuga zinjiza Tokens ya muntu (HMT) igihe cyose abakoresha bakoresha widget ya hCaptcha kurubuga rwabo, kandi ibigo byiga imashini byishyura abantu Tokens kugirango babone amakuru yabo.
home-benefits-text-1: Wabonye ko burigihe ukanze kumodoka ufasha gutoza sisitemu imwe yo kwiga imashini ya Gigantic kubuntu?
home-benefits-text-2: hCaptcha ihindura iyi moderi. Iyo ukoresheje hCaptcha, ibigo bisaba akazi abakoresha bawe bakora nkuko byerekana ubumuntu bwabo. Urabona ibihembo.
home-benefits-text-3: Urashaka gusubiza mubikorwa ukunda? hCaptcha igufasha gushyigikira abagiraneza wahisemo hamwe ninjiza wunguka kuyikoresha. Abakoresha kurubuga rwawe vuba bazashobora kubona umusanzu wawe mubikorwa byurukundo binyuze mubirango byubwenge kuri interineti ya hCaptcha.
home-challenges-text-1: ... n'indi mirimo yoroshye. Biroroshye kubantu, biragoye kuri bots.
home-challenges-text-2: Imirimo yihariye nayo iraboneka kubatangaza imishinga.
home-intro-body: Ukoresha capcha kugirango wirinde bots? hCaptcha irinda ubuzima bwite bwabakoresha, ihemba imbuga za interineti, kandi ifasha ibigo kubona amakuru yabyo. Nibitonyanga bisimburwa kuri reCAPTCHA: urashobora guhinduka muminota mike.
home-intro-head: Hagarika bots nyinshi. Tangira kurinda ubuzima bwite bwabakoresha.
home-main-1: Abikorera. Umutekano. Byihuta. Kandi turakwishura kugirango uyikoreshe.
home-main-2c: Imiyoboro yamamaza ibona abashyitsi bawe nkibicuruzwa. Kuri hCaptcha ibicuruzwa nakazi batanga. Ntabwo dushishikajwe no gukoresha abakoresha bawe, gusa birashoboka ko bashobora kuba babi. Dushyigikiye ibikorwa nkibanga ryibanga, kandi dukora cyane kugirango duhuze ubuzima bwite numutekano.
home-main-3c: Ukuri ni inyungu zawe kandi ni izacu. hCaptcha yibanze kubamamaza. Turakora kugirango tuguhe amakuru nyayo kandi tureke guhitamo uko uyakoresha. Ibindi bisobanuro bitangwa na Gigantic yamamaza. Ibi bivuze ko bot yose bahagaritse irashobora kugabanya amafaranga yinjira.
home-main-4c: Imashini zigezweho zo kwiga imashini zikoreshwa na hCaptcha muguhitamo ikiremwamuntu. Ibi biradusaba gusaba imirimo idahwitse kubakoresha kandi tugafata umwanya muto wo kubikora, mugihe ugikora amakuru yingirakamaro yanditseho ibirango kubakiriya.
home-main-plans: hCaptcha nubuntu bwo gukoresha kubatangaza ubunini ubwo aribwo bwose. Ariko, kubigo na platform bikeneye kugenzurwa cyane, ibisubizo byibikorwa byacu birahari.
home-main-plans2: hCaptcha yibisubizo birinda miriyoni yabakoresha kurubuga rwa miriyoni mirongo kurubuga rwa bimwe mubigo bikomeye kwisi. Nyamuneka twandikire kubindi bisobanuro, cyangwa gusura
home-main-plans3: hCaptcha yibisubizo birinda miriyoni yabakoresha kurubuga rwa miriyoni mirongo kurubuga rwa bimwe mubigo bikomeye kwisi. Nyamuneka twandikire kubindi bisobanuro, cyangwa gusura
home-plans-chart-row-6-cell-1: Politiki y’ibanga ya GDPR na CCPA
home-try-it-out-text: HCaptcha itanga ibintu byoroshye, byoroshye, kandi byizewe gutahura bot mugihe ari nto kubantu bakemura.
labeling-about-text-1: hCaptcha yashizweho kugirango ikemure ikibazo cyibanda cyane kubikorwa byo kwiga imashini; kuranga umubare munini wamakuru muburyo bwihuse, buhendutse, kandi bwizewe. Amakuru menshi muri rusange atanga ibisubizo byiza muburyo bwo kwiga imashini yiga. Intsinzi iheruka yicyitegererezo cyimbitse yatumye habaho imibare nini cyane, kandi hCaptcha ikora iki gikenewe.
labeling-about-text-2: Ariko, gukora imibare nini yasuzumwe nabantu ukoresheje uburyo gakondo biratinda kandi bihenze. hCaptcha nuburyo bwibigo kugirango babone ibisobanuro bakeneye byihuse, hamwe nubwiza buhanitse kandi ku giciro gito ugereranije nubundi buryo.
labeling-annotations-text-1: Kumenya neza ibintu mumashusho na videwo
labeling-annotations-text-2: Kumenya neza ibintu mumashusho na videwo
labeling-annotations-text-4: Gutondeka cyangwa kongeramo ibyiciro uko bishakiye
labeling-annotations-text-6: Ukeneye ubundi bwoko butanditswe hano? Tubaze.
labeling-ent-button: Menyesha itsinda ryacu rishinzwe gukemura ibibazo
labeling-ent-text-1: Ihuriro rya HUMAN inyuma ya hCaptcha ritanga ubuhanga buhanitse bwakazi hamwe nubuyobozi bukoreshwa binyuze mubikorwa, bivangavanze, cyangwa SaaS byoherejwe hamwe na sisitemu zisanzweho.
labeling-ent-text-2: Koresha rwose kumurongo hamwe nabakozi bawe bwite, ukurikirane agaciro gakoreshwa mubice byubucuruzi cyangwa abafatanyabikorwa ba consortium, hitamo inzira uhitamo imirimo itandukanye itanga abakozi bo mumbere cyangwa hanze bashingiye kubiciro nibisabwa mumutekano, nibindi byinshi.
labeling-ent-text-3: Kubona byoroshye API, ibyapa byiza, hamwe na moderi igezweho-muri-tekinoroji kugirango yongere imikorere.
labeling-ent-text-4: 99,99% amasaha yo hejuru na 24/7 inkunga yisi irahari. Kubindi bisobanuro:
labeling-features-head-2: Gukwirakwiza ibiciro hamwe nubuziranenge. Nta masezerano yo hejuru asabwa.
labeling-features-head-4: Tanga amakuru yawe bwite yukuri cyangwa reka tuyubake hejuru.
labeling-features-text-1: Urashaka kwinjiza ibitekerezo byabantu mubikorwa byawe byubucuruzi? Dutanga SLAs yizewe cyane, ubushobozi bwizewe, hamwe na REST APIs yoroshye.
labeling-features-text-2: Ihuriro rya HUMAN rikoresha icyitegererezo cyicyizere cyo gukora isesengura ryiza-nyaryo-nyaryo. Ibi biradufasha kumenya byihuse ingorane zibibazo nibisubizo bishoboka, bikagutwara igihe namafaranga.
labeling-features-text-3: Ibibazo byose ntabwo ari bimwe. Ibisobanuro kubikorwa byumutekano birashobora gusaba 99,99% icyizere kubakozi bose. Ibisobanuro kubintu bimwe bya beta muri porogaramu yimikino igendanwa birashobora gusaba gusa ikizere giciriritse. Urahitamo.
labeling-features-text-4: Ufite amakuru yibanze adafite igenzura ryuzuye? Mubihe byinshi dushobora kubaka imwe kuri wewe nkibikorwa bikoreshwa muri sisitemu, cyangwa gukora ibyapa byanditse kugirango ubyemeze.
labeling-info-text-1: Vugana numwe mubahanga bacu kugirango tumenye ibikenewe byumushinga: intego nyayo, imiterere, nibisabwa bidasanzwe.
labeling-info-text-2: Dukora umurimo muto wo gukora dushingiye kumibare yawe y'icyitegererezo. Ibi biragerageza akazi twakoranye kugirango tumenye neza ibyo ukeneye.
labeling-info-text-3: Hamwe nijwi ryacu ryinshi nubukererwe buke tuzahindura akazi kawe vuba, hamwe nogutanga byikora mugihe birangiye.
labeling-info-text-4: Mugihe twunvise neza ibipimo byimirimo yawe yo kubyara, ibisubizo bizakomeza gutera imbere mugihe.
labeling-info-text-5: Ikibaho kizima kigufasha gutanga ibitekerezo cyangwa guhagarika umusaruro umwanya uwariwo wose.
labeling-main-1c: Ukeneye ibirango byinshi kuri datasets yawe? hCaptcha itanga amakuru yihuse, ihendutse, kandi yujuje ubuziranenge amakuru yerekana ibigo bikora ubwenge bwubuhanga hamwe no kwiga imashini.
labeling-main-2c: hCaptcha ifite kimwe mubidendezi binini kwisi biboneka kugirango ukoreshe. Igipimo cyanyu cyose, turashobora kugikora tutarinze kwiyemeza imbere. Amamiriyoni yimirimo kumunsi ntakibazo.
labeling-platform-text: hCaptcha yubatswe kuri platifomu ya HUMAN, ituma inzira nisesengura bihanitse bigamije kunoza ibiciro no gukora neza kuri buri ntambwe. Iri koranabuhanga rireka abakozi bakwiriye gukora buri gice cyakazi kawe, bikagufasha gukoresha neza ibiciro mugihe urinda ubuzima bwite kandi wujuje ibisabwa byose bishobora gukurikizwa.
labeling-try-text: ... twiteguye iyo uri: serivise yacu iraboneka kumasaha.
page-acc-faq-1: Ikibazo: Ese hCaptcha Igice 508 + WCAG 2.1 AA yujuje? Igisubizo: Turabyemera: abakoresha bose bafite uburyo ubwo aribwo bwose bwabafite ubushobozi bwo kureba kurubuga no kwandika inyandiko kumpapuro barashobora kubona serivisi zirinzwe na hCaptcha nyuma yo kwiyandikisha. Ariko, iyi ntabwo ari inama zemewe: ugomba gukora isuzuma ryawe, urebye ishyirwa mubikorwa ryihariye kugirango umenye ko aribyo byoherejwe.
page-acc-faq-2: Ikibazo: Urimo gukora kubindi bisobanuro (a11y), nka majwi? Igisubizo: Mbere ibyamamare bizwi cyane nka capchas amajwi bivangura abakoresha a11y kandi bigatsindwa byoroshye nubuhanga bugezweho bwo kwiga imashini. Ibi byatumye ibibazo byamajwi bigora cyane kandi bigoye, kumenyekanisha urusaku, ibihe bidasanzwe, guhuza amagambo adasanzwe, nibindi kugirango batsinde abateye. Ntabwo rero dushishikajwe nubu buryo va kwirinda ibibazo burundu, ariko tuzabisuzuma niba hari icyifuzo cyumuryango a11y. Ariko, dushishikajwe cyane na Passage yi banga kugirango ikoreshwe. Twizera ko guhuza uburyo bwacu bwa a11y hamwe nogutanga Pass Pass bizemerera abakoresha a11 gushakisha neza, umutekano mubumenyi ko traffic yabo yigenga, mugihe hagabanywa ihohoterwa ryabakoresha bot byanze bikunze bibaho mugihe amahitamo ya11y ahari. Turi abitabira cyane mumatsinda ya IETF ikora ubu buryo bushya.
page-acc-faq-3: Ikibazo: Bite ho kwiherera? Kwiyandikisha birerekana a11yamakuru yo gushakisha muburyo bumwe? Ukora iki kuri imeri? Igisubizo: HCaptcha yagenewe ubuzima bwite kuva hasi. Iratandukanye cyane namahitamo gakondo nka reCAPTCHA ifitwe numuyoboro wamamaza, ufite ubushake bwo kugukurikirana kurubuga no kuguhuza nindangamuntu nyayo. Ntabwo twigera dukoresha imeri cyangwa amakuru kubintu byose usibye koroshya gukoresha11 no gukumira ihohoterwa. Politiki y’ibanga yacu ifite ibisubizo byuzuye kandi byemewe byukuntu dukoresha amakuru, ariko igisubizo kigufi nuko nta nyungu dufite zo kuguhuza nkumuntu ufite amateka yawe yo gushakisha. Ubu natwe turimo gukora igisubizo cyibanga kugirango twamagane aderesi imeri yawe byihuse. mugihe tukibungabunga ubushobozi bwacu bwo gukumira ihohoterwa, twuzuza akazi kacu ka Private.
page-acc-link-1: Niba uri umukoresha, nyamuneka iyandikishe hano.
page-acc-subhead: Kugenzura uburyo bworoshye kubakoresha bose mugihe ubungabunga umutekano
page-acc-summary-contents-1: hCaptcha yagenewe guhagarika bots mubatandukanya nabantu. Ibizamini bigaragara ni igikoresho cyoroshye kuri ibi, ariko ntabwo buriwese ashobora gukemura ikibazo kiboneka. Kubwiyi mpamvu, twateguye ubundi buryo bworoshye, butababaza kureka abamamaji dukoresheje serivise yacu ikabika abantu bose hamwe igice cyuzuye 508 na WCAG 2.1 AA kubahiriza.
page-acc-summary-contents-2: Uburyo ikora: ubanza, umukoresha ashobora kwiyandikisha kuriyi URL, ihujwe nurupapuro rwamakuru rwa widget ya hCaptcha. Bahabwa kuki ihishe ishobora gukoreshwa inshuro nyinshi kumunsi, ariko igomba gusubirwamo buri masaha 24 ikoresheje kwinjira.Iyo ikibazo cyerekanwe kubakoresha kugerwaho kurubuga urwo arirwo rwose bakoresheje serivisi ya hCaptcha, bazahita batambuka.
page-acc-tr-body:
Ikibazo: Ndacyabona ikibazo nyuma yo gushiraho kuki. Ni iki kibitera?
Igisubizo: Ibi mubisanzwe biterwa no gukoresha adresse yamamaza cyangwa kwagura anti-kuki, cyangwa igenamiterere rihagarika kuki zambukiranya imbuga, muriki gihe kuki ya hcaptcha.com yashyizweho cyangwa igenzurwa na hCaptcha JS kurubuga rutandukanye. , nkuwo usuye.

hCaptcha iboneka kuki ikorana nabashakishwa bose bakunzwe hamwe nabahagarika kwamamaza hamwe nibisanzwe bisanzwe, kubwibyo rero kunanirwa biterwa ninyandiko zirwanya anti-adblock cyangwa amategeko asa nayo yibanda kurubuga runaka.

Ibisubizo:

1. Whitelist hcaptcha.com na * .hcaptcha.com kuki muguhagarika kwamamaza cyangwa kwagura umutekano wa mushakisha.
2. Niba ukoresha mushakisha ya Brave, itagaragara kuri ubu ifite ubwoko ubwo aribwo bwose bwa whitelist, jya kuri Preferences -> Shields -> Cookies hanyuma uhitemo Emerera Cookies zose.
3. Niba ukoresha verisiyo iheruka ya Safari kuri OS X 10.15 iherutse gusohoka cyangwa iOS 13.4, Apple imaze guhindura imyitwarire ya Safari ijyanye na kuki zindi zitatu, ikabuza zose kubusa. Turimo gushyira mubikorwa igisubizo, ariko hagati aho nyamuneka sura Ibyifuzo bya Safari, igice cyibanga, hamwe no kugenzura kurubuga: Irinde gukurikira imbuga kugirango ukoreshe kuki ishobora gukora nkuko byari byitezwe.

Ikibazo: Nkoresha ibikoresho byinshi. Nkeneye kwiyandikisha inshuro nyinshi?
Igisubizo: Oya. Nyamuneka kanda ihuza imeri imwe yoherejwe yoherejwe kuri buri gikoresho ukoresha kugirango ushireho kuki.

Ikibazo: Nigute nakwirinda mugice cya gatatu cya kuki mugihe nkoresha kuki igerwaho?
Igisubizo: Gukoresha ibanga iryo ari ryo ryose cyangwa iyamamaza ryamamaza rishyigikira urutonde rwurwego rwera (urugero: Inkomoko ya uBlock) ruzakora nkuko byari byitezwe: gusa menya neza ko hcaptcha.com yera.
page-acc-tr-title: Kubakoresha Abakoresha: Ibibazo Bikunze hamwe nubuyobozi bukemura ibibazo
page-acc-tr2-body:
Safari
Gushoboza kuki muri Safari (Mac): Jya kuri menu yamanutse ya Safari. Hitamo Ibyatoranijwe. Kanda ubuzima bwite mumwanya wo hejuru. Munsi ya 'Hagarika kuki' hitamo amahitamo 'Nta na rimwe.'
Gushoboza kuki muri Safari (iPhone / iPad iOS 11+): Fungura Igenamiterere ryawe. Kanda hasi hanyuma uhitemo Safari. Munsi Yibanga & Umutekano, uzimye 'Irinde Gukurikirana Urubuga' na 'Hagarika kuki zose'

Firefox
Kanda ku nkinzo ibumoso ya adresse ya adresse kurubuga urwo arirwo rwose. Kanda ahanditse Igenamiterere. Firefox Ibyifuzo Byibanga & Umutekano bizafungura. Munsi yo Kuzamura Gukurikirana Kurinda, hitamo Custom. Hitamo abakurikirana ninyandiko zo guhagarika uhitamo utwo dusanduku. Menya neza ko wafunguye hcaptcha.com.

Urashobora kandi kuzimya by'agateganyo uburinzi bumwe na bumwe muri Custom kugirango ukemure ibi, muguhitamo agasanduku k'isanduku: Hitamo agasanduku k'abakurikirana cyangwa uhitemo agasanduku k'ibisanduku niba ugifite ibibazo.

Google Chrome
Google Chrome (PC)
Hitamo igishushanyo cya Chrome. Hitamo Igenamiterere.
Jya kubanga n'umutekano, hanyuma kuki hamwe nandi makuru yurubuga.
Menya neza ko 'Hagarika kuki zindi-kuki' zidashoboka.

Google Chrome (Mac):
Fungura ibyifuzo bya Chrome uhereye kuri menu bar.
Jya kubanga n'umutekano, hanyuma kuki hamwe nandi makuru yurubuga.
Menya neza ko 'Hagarika kuki zindi-kuki' zidashoboka.

Google Chrome (Android):
Ku gikoresho cya Android, fungura porogaramu ya Chrome.
Hejuru iburyo, kanda Byinshi hanyuma Igenamiterere.
Kanda Igenamiterere ryurubuga hanyuma kuki.
Kuruhande rwa 'Cookies,' hindura igenamiterere kuri.
Reba agasanduku kuruhande rwa 'Emerera kuki ya gatatu.'

Internet Explorer
1. Hitamo ibikoresho mugice cyo hejuru-iburyo bwa ecran, hanyuma uhitemo 'Amahitamo ya enterineti'. Niba ufite menu Bar ishoboye, urashobora guhitamo 'Ibikoresho' hanyuma 'Amahitamo ya enterineti'.
2. Kanda ahanditse 'Ibanga'.
3. Hitamo buto ya 'Advanced'.
4. Munsi ya 'Igice cya gatatu-kuki' hitamo 'Emera'.
5. Kanda 'OK'
page-acc-tr2-head: Amabwiriza ya mushakisha ya kuki yambukiranya urubuga
priv-hc-text: Imiyoboro yamamaza ikubona nkibicuruzwa byabo. Ntabwo. Ntabwo dushishikajwe n’abakoresha abo ari bo, gusa birashoboka ko bashobora kuba babi. Dushyigikiye ibikorwa nkibanga ryibanga, kandi dukora cyane kugirango duhuze ubuzima bwite numutekano.
reporting-bugs-accessibility-text: Waba ufite ubumuga bwo kutabona cyangwa ubundi udashobora kurangiza hCaptchas?
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-1: Intambwe ya 1: Fungura ibikoresho byabateza imbere (Ibi bitangira gufata amajwi.)
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-2: Intambwe ya 2: Kanda kuri tab ya Network mubikoresho byabateza imbere. Reba agasanduku k'ibiti bya Persist hejuru.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-3: Intambwe ya 3: sura https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, cyangwa urubuga ufite ikibazo kuri (Icyitonderwa cyibanga: gusa niba udashaka gusangira ibyo aribyo) ... hanyuma ukande I am buto yumuntu, kandi ugerageze gukemura.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-4: Intambwe ya 4: Kanda HAR nyuma yo kugerageza gukemura, hanyuma uhitemo Kubika Byose nka HAR kugirango ubike logi y'urusobe. Ohereza iyo dosiye.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-5: Intambwe ya 5: Kanda kuri tab ya konsole, hanyuma ukande iburyo hanyuma uhitemo byose hanyuma ubike muri dosiye yinyandiko, kugirango ubike logi ya konsole. Ohereza natwe.
reporting-bugs-guide-ff-step-6: Intambwe yanyuma: Ohereza izo dosiye za HAR hamwe na konsole kuri dosiye, hanyuma usobanure ikibazo Koresha: support@hcaptcha.com (nyamuneka koresha serivise nka Dropbox cyangwa Filebin hanyuma wohereze amahuza) hanyuma uhitemo amashusho, niba ukeka ko hari ikintu kitagaragaza neza . Nyamuneka ohereza IP ukoresha nayo. Urashobora kuyikura kuri https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Urakoze gufata umwanya wo kudufasha kubona aya makuru! Twiyemeje gukora hCaptcha ikora neza kuri buri wese.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-1: Intambwe ya 1: Fungura ibikoresho byabateza imbere (Ibi bitangira gufata amajwi.)
reporting-bugs-guide-step-2: Intambwe ya 2: Kanda kuri tab ya Network mubikoresho byabateza imbere. Reba ahanditse Kubika agasanduku kari hejuru.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-3: Intambwe ya 3: sura https://accounts.hcaptcha.com/demo, cyangwa urubuga ufite ikibazo kuri (Icyitonderwa cyibanga: gusa niba udashaka gusangira ibyo aribyo) ... hanyuma ukande I am buto yumuntu, kandi ugerageze gukemura.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-4: Intambwe ya 4: Kanda Kohereza HAR (umwambi muto wo hasi) nyuma yo kugerageza gukemura, ibika logi y'urusobe. Ohereza iyo dosiye.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-5: Intambwe ya 5: Kanda kuri tab ya konsole, hanyuma ukande iburyo hanyuma ubike nka .. kugirango ubike logi ya konsole. Ohereza natwe.
reporting-bugs-guide-step-6: Intambwe yanyuma: Ohereza izo HAR hamwe na konsole ya dosiye kuri dosiye, hanyuma usobanure ikibazo. Koresha: support@hcaptcha.com (nyamuneka koresha serivise nka Dropbox cyangwa Filebin hanyuma wohereze amahuza) hanyuma uhitemo amashusho, niba ukeka ko hari ikintu kitagaragaye neza. Nyamuneka ohereza IP ukoresha nayo. Urashobora kuyikura kuri https://www.whatsmyip.org/ Urakoze gufata umwanya wo kudufasha kubona aya makuru! Twiyemeje gukora hCaptcha ikora neza kuri buri wese.
reporting-bugs-guide-text-1: Kohereza amakuru yo gukemura hamwe na raporo yawe bizatworohera cyane kumenya ibibera. Hano hari intambwe ku yindi amabwiriza:
reporting-bugs-guide-text-2: Niba uri umushinga wurubuga cyangwa umukoresha winzobere, incamake nuko twifuza ko utwoherereza umuyoboro wandika HAR hamwe na mushakisha ya konsole. Nyamuneka gerageza uhagarike iyamamaza ryose ryamamaza cyangwa kwagura umutekano wa mushakisha mbere hanyuma ugerageze mbere yuko unyura muri izi ntambwe. Niba ibyo bikemuye ikibazo cyawe, twagushimira ko utumenyesha verisiyo ya mushakisha yawe, iyamamaza ryamamaza cyangwa iyagurwa rya mushakisha, hamwe nurubuga rwa URL.
reporting-bugs-intro-text: Abantu babarirwa muri za miriyoni bakoresha hCaptcha buri kwezi, ku bihumbi ibihumbi bya mushakisha, kwagura, ibikoresho, firewall, nibindi byinshi. Intego yacu nukureba neza ko buri gihe igukorera, turashima cyane raporo zawe! Gutanga ibitekerezo byihuse, kanda buto yohereze ibitekerezo. Niba ubona ikibazo gikora, nyamuneka kurikiza amabwiriza yo gukuramo ya Chrome cyangwa amabwiriza yo gukuramo amabwiriza ya Firefox hepfo. Kubandi bashakisha bose twohereze imeri. Kubibazo byumutekano cyangwa ibibazo byihariye, reba amabwiriza hepfo.
reporting-bugs-privacy-text: Ntabwo dushishikajwe no gukoresha abakoresha abo ari bo, gusa birashoboka ko bashobora kuba babi cyangwa imashini. Dushyigikiye ibikorwa nkibanga ryibanga, kandi dukora cyane kugirango duhuze ubuzima bwite numutekano. Niba warabonye ikibazo utekereza ko gishobora kugira ingaruka kumabanga yukoresha, nyamuneka twandikire kuri support@hcaptcha.com.
reporting-bugs-provide-feedback-text: Twishimiye ibitekerezo byanyu. Tumenyeshe ibibazo byose kandi tuzabikemura vuba.
reporting-bugs-security-text: Buri gihe dushishikajwe no kwakira raporo zamakosa yumutekano. Ohereza imeri@hcaptcha.com & CC umutekano@hcaptcha.com hanyuma tuzakugarukira vuba. Dufite kandi progaramu ya bug bounty ya raporo yumutekano yujuje ibisabwa kuri serivisi ya hCaptcha hamwe na code yinkomoko.
sales-interstitial-c1b: Wige byinshi kubyerekeye Enterineti ya HCaptcha (BotStop)
sales-interstitial-c2b: Ongeraho hCaptcha kubatangaza kurubuga rwanjye cyangwa porogaramu
sales-interstitial-head: Reka tumenye neza ko ugera ahantu heza.
sec-hc-text: hCaptcha yibanze kubamamaza. Turakora kugirango duhe imbuga amakuru nyayo kandi tubareke bahitemo kuyakoresha. Ukuri ni inyungu zawe kandi ni izacu. Izindi capchas zitangwa namasosiyete yamamaza. Buri bot bahagaritse irashobora kugabanya amafaranga yinjira.
signup-interstitial-c1: Ku masosiyete cyangwa imbuga za interineti
signup-interstitial-c1b: Ongeraho hCaptcha kubatangaza kurubuga rwanjye cyangwa porogaramu
signup-interstitial-c1d: Wige byinshi kubyerekeye Enterineti ya HCaptcha (BotStop)
signup-interstitial-c2b: Wige kubyerekeye uburyo bwo kugera kuri hCaptcha
signup-interstitial-head: Reka tumenye neza ko ugera ahantu heza.
support-interstitial-c2b: Wige kubyerekeye uburyo bwo kugera kuri hCaptcha
support-interstitial-c2d: Wige byinshi kubyerekeye ibibazo bya software
support-interstitial-head: Reka tumenye neza ko ugera ahantu heza.
what-is-hcaptcha-text: hCaptcha ifasha serivise ukunda kurubuga kurinda bots, spam, no guhohoterwa mubaza ibibazo byoroshye byoroshye kubantu kandi bigoye kumashini.
why-hc-text: Igihe cyose usubije ikibazo, dukoresha imiterere ihanitse kugirango tumenye niba uri umuntu cyangwa imashini. Urubuga wasuye noneho rukoresha ibisubizo kugirango bigufashe kunoza uburambe kurubuga rwabo wirinda bots.
